attributes.action: Ban the practice of putting advertising leaflets in Magazines and also distributing Leaflets to households advertising products.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Banning this type of advertising would greatly help with the amount of waste paper that has to be recycled or disposed of and as these leaflets are obviously of good quality paper which requires the use of trees to make, will cut down on deforestation.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
